channel.title: CVE Feed for Basix -- NEX-Forms – Ultimate Form Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Basix -- NEX-Forms – Ultimate Form Builder

item.title: CVE-2024-47389|2024-10-05T14:47:11.582Z -- basix -- nex-forms%20%E2%80%93%20ultimate%20form%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Basix NEX-Forms – Ultimate Form Builder allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects NEX-Forms – Ultimate Form Builder: from n/a through 8.7.3.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Basix NEX-Forms – Ultimate Form Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects NEX-Forms – Ultimate Form Builder: from n/a through 8.5.10.
